Articles.Content:
First off i want to say I am sorry for not taking screenshots of everything. I ended forgetting because i was worried about fuel. I was right to be worried. I used the side mono tanks as Goo stand-ins. I can get a Goo around the mun and get a Goo around minmus and get a surface sample. Even though i ended with 0 units of fuel, i had to do a plane change to go to the mun. Sorry for my bad flying. If i redo it, i could end up with most likely 25-50 units of fuel left. I used the oberth effect to set up my transfer to minmus from the mun and from minmus to Kerbin impact. I would most likely get 100+ science on my second mission. What do you guys think?

Pictures

http://imgur.com/a/36043

Craft File

http://www./download/c3pqu4266n4huqv/Tier_2_Mun.craft

No landing legs? No problem

Last time I tried that it ended very badly

No landing legs? No problem

Last time I tried that it ended very badly

I was trying to save on weight and also they are not available in tier 2 of the tech tree.
And again I embarrass myself for not reading a post properly ><
